title: Public Holidays (Declaration) Notice, 2022
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government
Gazette dated Wednesday, 16th March, 2022 71
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 20 OF 2022
The Public Holidays Act
(Laws, Volume 15, Cap. 272)
The Public Holidays (Declaration) Notice, 2022
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 3 of the Public
Holidays Act, the following Notice is issued:
1. This Notice may be cited as the Public Holidays Title
(Declaration) Notice, 2022.
2. It is declared that Friday, 18th March, 2022 shall be observed Declaration
as a public holiday in view of the State funeral and burial of the of Public
Holiday
Fourth Republican President, Mr. Rupiah Bwezani Banda.
HAKAINDE HICHILEMA,
LUSAKA President
16th March, 2022
[CO. 101/9/1]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O.Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka Price K4.00 each
72 Statutory Instruments 16th March, 2022
